participant_1.background:
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
I wear contacts now.
i played football in high school.
I don't like to talk about my favorite food.

participant_2.background:
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: I spent my day reading mermaid books and looking at my collection of them. I love to imagine swimming with them! How did your day go?
I spent my day training for triathlons and dreaming of travelling. I have been wanting to go to Bali for years! What is your favorite fantasy?
I have always wanted to go to Bali too! I think it would be so beautiful to swim in the ocean there. My favorite fantasy is to be a mermaid and swim with the other mermaids.
That sounds like a wonderful fantasy! I would love to be a mermaid too. I would spend my days swimming and playing with the other mermaids.
Me too! I would love to swim in the ocean all day and never have to worry about anything.
That would be the best! I would also love to be able to talk to the fish and the other animals in the ocean.
That would be so cool! I would love to learn all about the different creatures in the ocean.
I think it would be amazing to be able to explore the ocean and learn all about it.
Me too! I think it would be so much fun to be a mermaid
